name: Union Européenne des Médecins Specialistes Ocuupational Medecine Section
membership: We are linked to the national associations, represented in our European association
goal: As association of the occupational physicians in Europe, we try to collaborate with EU-structures. E.G. We want to define the curriculum for the specialization, do accreditations for EACCME. We strive for more similarities in strategy within our different countries...
interests: Employment and Social Affairs, Public Health
euInitiatives:
EU strategic framework on Health and safety at work

Legislation on health at work

EU Campaign Healthy workplaces for all
